57431.「……あなた 町の入り口で会った人ね。\n パパなら 留守よ。なんの用？:
You, again? What do you want? My dad's not
here right now.

57433.「それ……姉さんの日記帳……。\n ねえ 返して……！<yesno><close:
That's... my sister's diary...! Hey, give
that to me!<yesno><close>

57434.「言うこと聞かないと 呪うわよ。\n 早く 返して……！<yesno><clos:
You'll regret it if you don't. Give it to me
right now!<yesno><close>

57435.<pc>は 女の子に\nきらきらした本を 渡した！:
<pc> gave the girl
the Glittering Book!

57436.「この日記帳 ずっと探してたの……。\n えっと あなたは……？:
I've been looking for this for so long...
Um... and you are...?

57437.「……ふうん <pc>というの。\n 私は ルコリア。この日記の持ち主である\n:
Mhm, your name's <pc>...
My name is Lucolia. This diary belongs to my
twin sister, Lieselotte...

57438.「これはね……。\n リゼロッタ姉さんの遺品なの……。: It was... left behind by my sister...

57439.「めずらしく 部屋から出てきたと思ったら\n 玄関先で 立ち話か。\n お前には:
It's not often you come out of your room, and
now you're standing here talking. Don't you
have anything better to do?

57440.「パ…パパは 毎日 お忙しいもの……ね。\n 姉さんの墓参りなんて 忘れちゃうく:
Y...you're busy every single day... too busy
to visit even your own daughter's grave...

57441.「子供が 大人の仕事に クチをはさむな！\n あんな恥さらし 娘でもなんでもない:
A child has no idea what they're talking
about! You are a disgrace. You are not my
daughter.

57442.「旅の方。せっかく お訪ねいただいたのに\n すみませんが 今は 立て込んでおり:
I'm sorry, traveler, but I am much too busy
today. I must ask you to leave.

57443.「……日記帳 届けてくれて ありがと。\n それじゃ さよなら。:
Thank you for bringing this diary to me...
Well, goodbye...
